title: 1  Introduction

This book is a study note on Linux and R code created by hss.

library(pacman)
p_load(ggplot2)

title: 2  介绍两种下载方法
text: 2.1 Ascp
crumbs: 2  介绍两种下载方法

title: 2  介绍两种下载方法
text:
进入NCBI,在DataSets栏下搜索文献测序数据，如bulk码为GSE95424;单细胞码为PRJNA906632;
将BioProject码复制到www.ebi.ac.uk的Enter acsession栏进行搜索;
Show Column Selection的fastq_*选项全选中;
Download ALL——Generated FASTQ files:FTP,将文件重命名为fq.txt,并上传到服务器。


2.1.1 ENA下载链接改名
sed -i 's/wget -nc ftp:\/\/ftp.sra.ebi.ac.uk/fasp.sra.ebi.ac.uk:/g' fq.txt


2.1.2 运行代码为 nohup ascp.sh >ascp.log 2>&1 &

下载下来的压缩包一般为*.fastq.gz

#!/bin/bash
#ascp.sh 内容如下
#批量下载
cat fq.txt |while read id 
do 
ascp -QT -l 300m -P33001 -k 1 -i ~/.conda/envs/download/etc/asperaweb_id_dsa.openssh era-fasp@$id .
done

#单独下载
ascp -QT -l 300m -P33001 -k 1 -i ~/.conda/envs/download/etc/asperaweb_id_dsa.openssh era-fasp@将①改名后的内容选择一个复制进来 .


2.1.3 将文件转移到raw_data
mkdir raw_data
mv *.fastq.gz raw_data
crumbs: 2  介绍两种下载方法

title: 2  介绍两种下载方法
text:
2.2 prefetch

进入NCBI,在DataSets栏下搜索文献测序数据，如bulk码为GSE95424;单细胞码为PRJNA906632
点击SRA Run Selector进入网页，再点击select选项下的Accession List下载
获得SRR_Acc_List.txt文件，并上传到服务器 注：打开此文件光标要位于空白行的首位。


2.2.1 下载SRR文件
mkdir -p raw_data
#批量下载
nohup prefetch -O ./raw_data --option-file SRR_Acc_List.txt >prefetch.log 2>&1 &

#单独下载一个
prefetch SRRXXXXXXXX


2.2.2 把当前文件夹的下一级子文件夹中的sra文件移动到当前文件夹来
find . -mindepth 2 -maxdepth 2 -type f -name "*.sra" -exec mv {} . \;


2.2.3 将SRA文件转化为fastq文件,完成后删除*.sra文件
#-S是--split-files，#-e 10开十线程，#*.sra所有sra文件 --include-technical为单细胞才加
nohup fasterq-dump -S -e 10 *.sra >faster1.log 2>&1 &


#转化单独一个文件
fasterq-dump -S -e 10 SRRXXXXXXX.sra


2.2.4 将fastq文件压缩为fq.gz文件
#-k 保留原文件，-d是解压
nohup gzip  *.fastq >gzip.log 2>&1 &

#压缩单独一个
gzip SRRXXXXXX.fastq
crumbs: 2  介绍两种下载方法

title: 3  转录组上游分析
text: 3.1 运行Fastqc

title: 3  转录组上游分析
text:
nohup ./fastqc.sh >fastqc.log 2>&1 &

运行前检查脚本权限是否开通——chmod +x *.sh
文件格式记得检查修改(fastq.gz;fq.gz)

#!/bin/bash
cd ./raw_data
mkdir -p ../fastqc_results

for file in *_1.fq.gz 
do
    base_name=$(echo $file | sed 's/_1.fq.gz//')
    file2=${base_name}_2.fq.gz
    if [ -e "$file2" ]; then
        echo "Running fastqc on $file and $file2 with 10 threads..."
        
        fastqc -t 10 -o ../fastqc_results $file $file2 
    else echo "Matching file for $file not found."
    fi 
done 
echo "FastQC analysis is complete."

title: 3  转录组上游分析
text:
3.2 运行Trim_galord
nohup ./trim_galore.sh >trim_galore.log 2>&1 &

文件格式记得检查修改(fastq.gz;fq.gz)

#!/bin/bash
cd ./raw_data
output_dir="../trimmed" 
if [ ! -d "$output_dir" ]; then 
  mkdir -p "$output_dir" 
fi

for file in *_1.fq.gz 
do 
  base=$(basename $file _1.fq.gz)
  file1=${base}_1.fq.gz 
  file2=${base}_2.fq.gz 
  
  if [ -f "$file2" ]; then 
    echo "Processing $file1 and $file2 with trim_galore..."
    
    trim_galore  -q 20 --phred33 --stringency 3 --length 20 -e 0.1 -o $output_dir --paired $file1 $file2 
  else
    echo "Paired file for $file1 not found." 
  fi 
done

title: 3  转录组上游分析
text:
3.3 运行Hisat2
nohup ./hisat2.sh >hisat2.log 2>&1 &

注：mouse——grcm38;human——grch38
文件格式记得检查修改(fastq.gz;fq.gz)

#!/bin/bash
cd ./trimmed


INDEX="$HOME/lwl/reference/grcm38/genome"
OUTPUT_DIR="../bam/"   
THREADS=12                    


mkdir -p $OUTPUT_DIR

for R1 in *_1_val_1.fq.gz
do
    BASE=$(basename $R1 _1_val_1.fq.gz)
    R2=${BASE}_2_val_2.fq.gz
    output_bam=${OUTPUT_DIR}/${BASE}.bam
    hisat2 -p $THREADS -x $INDEX -1 $R1 -2 $R2 | samtools view -Sb > $output_bam 
    
    echo "Processed $BASE"
done

text:
3.4 运行下面代码获得counts.txt文件

注：mouse——vM35,human——v46
用excel打开删除第一行，保存为.CSV文件

featureCounts -T 12 -p -t exon -g gene_id -a ~/lwl/reference/gencode.vM35.chr_patch_hapl_scaff.annotation.gtf.gz -o ./counts.txt *.bam

title: 4  上游矩阵到clean_data
text: 4.1 处理当前文件夹，读入文件（数据框），使用biomaRt包

objectID: r-note.html#处理当前文件夹读入文件数据框使用biomart包
href: r-note.html#处理当前文件夹读入文件数据框使用biomart包
title: 4  上游矩阵到clean_data
4  上游矩阵到clean_data
text:
4.2 使用网页数据库ensembl

进行种属比对提取ENSG IDs(Gene Symbols和Entrez Gene IDs)

ensembl <- useEnsembl(biomart = "genes", dataset = "hsapiens_gene_ensembl")#鼠mmusculus,人hsapiens
ensg_ids <- filtered_counts[, 1]
annotations <- getBM(attributes = c('ensembl_gene_id', 'hgnc_symbol', 'entrezgene_id'),#鼠mgi_symbol，人hgnc_symbol
                     filters = 'ensembl_gene_id', values = ensg_ids, mart = ensembl)

title: 4  上游矩阵到clean_data
text:
4.3 进行左连接

因为有时候annotations的顺序可能和原始的ensg_ids不一致，所以我们需要以ensg_ids为基础进行左连接

counts_data_annotated <- merge(filtered_counts, annotations, by.x = 'Geneid', by.y = 'ensembl_gene_id', all.x = TRUE, sort = FALSE)

objectID: r-note.html#将gene-symbol和gene-id插入到第一列后面

title: 4  上游矩阵到clean_data
text:
4.5 去重复

列数和矩阵数据要对应

checklwl <- data_annotated 
data_unique <- checklwl[!duplicated(checklwl[[1]]), ]
head(data_unique)
matrix <-data_unique[,c(1:3,9:14)]
#sample_info <- data_unique[,1:3]
#chr_info <- data_unique[,c(1,4:8)]

write.csv(matrix, "matrix.csv", row.names = FALSE)
write.csv(data_unique, "all.csv", row.names = FALSE)
head(matrix)
#write.csv(sample_info, "sample_info.csv", row.names = FALSE)
#write.csv(chr_info, "chr_info.csv", row.names = FALSE)

title: 4  上游矩阵到clean_data
text:
4.6 使用readr包，读取矩阵数据

由于样品名首位必须以字母命名,所以要定义新的列名 删除空白，NA以及去重复，将清理后的数据写入新的CSV文件，得到cleaned_data

#第二步----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
library(readr)
data <- read.csv("matrix.csv")
new_col_names <- c("c1","c2","c3","k1", "k2","k3")
colnames(data)[2:7] <- new_col_names #看有多少个样品
cleaned_data <- data[data$GeneSymbol != "", ]
cleaned_data <- na.omit(cleaned_data)
data_unique <- cleaned_data[!duplicated(cleaned_data[[1]]), ]
write.csv(data_unique, "cleaned_matrix.csv")
head(data_unique)

title: 5  Single cell upstream analysis
text: 5.1 10X genomics Analysis

title: 5  Single cell upstream analysis
text:
5.1.1 Cell Ranger
A set of analysis pipelines that perform sample demultiplexing, barcode processing, single cell 3’ and 5’ gene counting, V(D)J transcript sequence assembly and annotation, and Feature Barcode analysis from single cell data.

1.Download cellranger download website
2.Tutorials Tutorials (cellranger count,cellranger mkref)

title: 5  Single cell upstream analysis
text:
5.2 Dnbc4tools Analysis
An open source and flexible pipeline to analyze high-throughput DNBelab C SeriesTM single-cell datasets.
Hardware/Software requirements

x86-64 compatible processors.
require at least 50GB of RAM and 4 CPU.
centos 7.x 64-bit operating system (Linux kernel 3.10.0, compatible with higher software and hardware configuration).



5.2.1 Conda preparation
1. Create dnbc4tools environment
conda create -n dnbc4tools python=3.8 perl
conda activate dnbc4tools
2. Install dnbc4tools
conda install refer to MGI Website
conda install -c conda-forge -c bioconda htslib=1.18 samtools=1.18
pip install dnbc4tools==2.1.2
Successfully installed dnbc4tools


5.2.2 scRNA
1.Build index for reference genome

Human(GRCh38)

wget http://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/pub/databases/gencode/Gencode_human/release_32/GRCh38.primary_assembly.genome.fa.gz
wget http://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/pub/databases/gencode/Gencode_human/release_32/gencode.v32.primary_assembly.annotation.gtf.gz
gzip -d GRCh38.primary_assembly.genome.fa.gz
gzip -d gencode.v32.primary_assembly.annotation.gtf.gz

$dnbc4tools tools mkgtf --ingtf gencode.v32.primary_assembly.annotation.gtf --output genes.filter.gtf --type gene_type
               
$dnbc4tools rna mkref --ingtf genes.filter.gtf --fasta GRCh38.primary_assembly.genome.fa --threads 10 --species Homo_sapiens

Mouse(GRCm38)

wget http://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/pub/databases/gencode/Gencode_mouse/release_M23/GRCm38.primary_assembly.genome.fa.gz
wget http://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/pub/databases/gencode/Gencode_mouse/release_M23/gencode.vM23.primary_assembly.annotation.gtf.gz
gzip -d GRCm38.primary_assembly.genome.fa.gz
gzip -d gencode.vM23.primary_assembly.annotation.gtf.gz

$dnbc4tools tools mkgtf --ingtf gencode.vM23.primary_assembly.annotation.gtf --output genes.filter.gtf --type gene_type
                        
$dnbc4tools rna mkref --ingtf genes.filter.gtf --fasta GRCm38.primary_assembly.genome.fa --threads 10 --species Mus_musculus
2. Run
Running the main workflow
$dnbc4tools rna run \
    --cDNAfastq1 /test/data/test_cDNA_R1.fastq.gz \
    --cDNAfastq2 /test/data/test_cDNA_R2.fastq.gz \
    --oligofastq1 /test/data/test_oligo1_1.fq.gz,/test/data/test_oligo2_1.fq.gz \
    --oligofastq2 /test/data/test_oligo1_2.fq.gz,/test/data/test_oligo2_2.fq.gz \
    --genomeDir /database/scRNA/Mus_musculus/mm10  \
    --name test --threads 10
Use the multi command to process multiple samples
$dnbc4tools rna multi --list samplelist \
         --genomeDir /database/scRNA/Mus_musculus/mm10 \
         --threads 10
sample list

–list

Generate a three-column list with tab ( separators. The first column contains sample names, the second contains cDNA library sequencing data, and the third contains oligo library sequencing data. Multiple fastq files should be separated by commas, and R1 and R2 files should be separated by semicolons.
Here’s an example of how the input list should be formatted:

$sample1 cDNA1_R1.fq.gz;cDNA1_R2.fq.gz oligo1_R1.fq.gz,oligo4_R1.fq.gz;oligo1_R2.fq.gz,oligo4_R2.fq.gz 
$sample2 cDNA2_R1.fq.gz;cDNA2_R2.fq.gz oligo2_R1.fq.gz;oligo2_R2.fq.gz 
$sample3 cDNA3_R1.fq.gz;cDNA3_R2.fq.gz oligo3_R1.fq.gz;oligo3_R2.fq.gz

More detailed parameter description

title: 6  VScode-R
text:
6.3 配置扩展程序

6.3.1 安装R插件

Language pack extension for Chinese (Simplified)(可选)
R Extension for Visual Studio Code
R Debugger for VS Code




6.3.2 安装 languageserver和httpdg

在Rstudio，R Gui，VScode安装都可以。


install.packages("languageserver")
install.packages("httpgd")#图形输出包



6.3.3 安装Radian(暂时有bug可不安)

确保有conda环境和python，安装Anaconda3，官网下载Anaconda3下载,记得添加环境变量。


win+R,输入cmd，回车


查看conda是否存在？以及软件有哪些？


conda list



安装radian

pip install radian



6.3.4 配置radian(暂时不用radian用R)

where radian 确定路径

VScode打开设置，搜索r.rterm.windows，把路径粘贴上。

因为radian有bug，在帖子上看到也可以直接填R的路径不使用radian。
D:\R-4.4.1\bin\x64\R.exe






注意



是x64下面的R.exe不是bin下面的R.exe




6.3.5 其他配置

VScode打开设置，搜索r.rterm.options，删除–no-save,–no-restore，添加–no-site-file



搜索r.bracketed，勾选中bracketed paste



搜索r.sessionWatcher，勾选



搜索r.plot.use.httpdg，勾选


5.搜索r.lsp.diagnostics , 然后 disable 即可取消蓝色波浪线提示
